backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor that stores and manages high scores per user (Principal), allowing users to set and retrieve their high scores with timestamp tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting Spanish translation implementation across game UI components and HTML metadata with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing a Spanish-localized tap game with React components, hooks, styling, and game state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color system and game-specific design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Spanish language attribute, translated title "Galaxia del Toque", and Spanish meta description for the game.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping GameLayout with ThemeProvider (dark mode default) and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Component rendering placeholder zones for banner and interstitial ads with visual indicators for ad placement positions.
frontend/src/components/GameControls.tsx: Button component for game controls displaying Spanish text "Comenzar Juego" and "Jugar de Nuevo" based on game status.
frontend/src/components/GameIcon.tsx: Simple component displaying the game icon image from generated assets.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Main layout with animated star background, top/bottom ad banners, centered game content, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/GameOverScreen.t: Game over screen with Spanish text showing final score, high score comparison, interstitial ad placeholder, and play again button with conditional messaging based on performance.
frontend/src/components/HighScoreDisplay: Component displaying current high score with trophy icon and Spanish label "Puntuación Máxima" with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/TapGame.tsx: Core game component with Spanish title "GALAXIA DEL TOQUE" managing tap interactions, combo system, score tracking, animations, and game lifecycle with backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated states with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Custom React hook managing game state including score, timer (30s countdown), and game status (idle/playing/gameOver) with functions to start, end, increment score, and reset the game.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, providing login/logout functionality, identity management, and authentication status tracking with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating high score data from the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a dark space-themed color palette and game-specific component classes (game-card, game-button) with gradients and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom color variables (using oklch color space), game-specific colors, border radius variables, and typography/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (mobile game mechanic, state persistence, ad placeholders, Spanish localization) and pending Android/AdSense integration requests for the 'Tap Galaxy' game.
